dataset_description.Name: PerceiveImagine
ReferencesAndLinks: Roy Y, Banville H, Albuquerque I, et al. Deep learning-based electroencephalography analysis: a systematic review[J]. Journal of neural engineering, 2019, 16(5): 051001.

readme_content: Participants perceive the image for 6 seconds based on the prompt, then close their eyes and imagine the image they just saw for 6 seconds based on the prompt. After hearing the prompt sound, they enter the next loop
